TopicTitle: KSP Crashing in VAB when using RSS

Articles.Content: Exactly as I stated above. This has been doing this since I started messing around with it last night, but it is getting annoying since it is doing it now while I am trying to put the Proton rocket (OLDD) together so I can launch the first piece of the ISS. Help!
Ok, now it's crashing mid flight, I removed my FASA pack and that seems to have fixed the VAB crash, but now it keeps crashing mid-flight

Odds are you're running out of memory, but we'll need your output_log.txt to be sure.

Please read the How to Get Support sticky at the top of this forum.

Odds are you're running out of memory, but we'll need your output_log.txt to be sure.

Please read the How to Get Support sticky at the top of this forum.

Ok, I'm a noob, but how do I post my output_log.text?
The forums don't allow attachments, so you'll need to upload it to a website like Dropbox or Google Drive and then post the public link here.
ok, just as an update, it APPEARS as though the game fixed itself because I just completed a full launch without a crash! I'll post the file anyway, though
if you're playing in RSS remove all fuel tanks and only use Procedural Parts for fuel tank
